name: The Program
description:
The Program- The game made that won ShefJam 4 in less than 24 hours with Christopher Mimm and Mohammad AO. Play as a newly created player in a "game within a game". Things are not what they seem and the plot slowly reveals itself from there...

The theme of the jam was Overlords.

Made using Game Maker Studio 1.4

Music written in Famitracker
